name: Erwin's Timewarp
description:
Erwin's Timewarp is an Adventure game in which the player controls a dog named Erwin, the pet of the scientist Dr. Zachory. He has invented a time machine with that Erwin was transferred to the time 1984 by accident. In order to come back to present time Erwin has to find parts of a time machine in different words and times. For this task a lot of puzzles have to be solved.

Features:

  • Control your player through a Top-Down camera environment
  • Collect and combine items to solve puzzles
  • Take care of aggressors and traps
  • There are companions that help you
  • Graphics are a nice mix of comic- and arcade style
  • The camera can be rotated and zoomed using the mouse-wheel
